biotools.summary: FTMAP is a webserver that globally samples the surface of a target protein using small organic molecules as probes to identify and predict binding hot spots. Users can also input small molecule probes.

bioschemas.name: FTMAP
bioschemas.summary: FTMAP is a webserver that globally samples the surface of a target protein using small organic molecules as probes to identify and predict binding hot spots. Users can also input small molecule probes.
